basics.label: Center Director/Head Start Family Advocate
basics.summary: Organized and dependable candidate successful at managing multiple priorities with a positive attitude. Offering excellent communication and good judgment. Conscientious individual with the ability to multitask and liaise between families and programs to build relationships that support ongoing development and education.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Collaborated with families to assist in growth, development and education to increase potential. Identified community resources and programs for families of disabled children. Observed security measures to maintain confidentiality and restrict access to unauthorized individuals. Managed 14 Employees.
highlights: Conducted regular staff meetings to obtain feedback on important issues.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Collaborated with families to assist in growth, development and education to increase potential. Identified community resources and programs for families of disabled children. Documented data and completed accurate updates to case records.
highlights: Completed home welfare checks to align with state and program guidelines.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Kept students on-task with proactive behavior modification and positive reinforcement strategies. Assisted teachers with classroom management and document coordination to maintain positive learning environment.
highlights: Performed staff monitoring duties such as overseeing recess, lunch and daily student intake and dismissal.
